com.appittome.udacity.client
Interface Connection.OnNewCsrfTokenListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
SignInCredentials
Enclosing class:
Connection
public static interface Connection.OnNewCsrfTokenListener

Implement to listen for new CSRF_TOKENS. Each time a new token is found (regex "csrf_token = \\\".{60}\\\"") the most recent page, the token is passed out via the onNewCsrfToken method.

Method Summary
 void onNewCsrfToken(java.lang.String token)
          Passed a CSRF_TOKEN everytime the regex pattern "csrf_token = \\\".{60}\\\"" is found on the most recent page loaded from the server.
 

Method Detail

onNewCsrfToken

void onNewCsrfToken(java.lang.String token)
Passed a CSRF_TOKEN everytime the regex pattern "csrf_token = \\\".{60}\\\"" is found on the most recent page loaded from the server.

Parameters:
token - CSRF_TOKEN as string
